title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Region, and a y axis representing Number of employees.
The highest category is found at Europe where Number of employees is 70599.0.
The lowest category is found at Africa_India_Middle-East where Number of employees is 1848.0.
gold: The statistic shows the worldwide number of Michelin 's employees in 2018 , by region . Michelin had 21,541 employees in North America in 2018 . In that same year , some 17.5 percent of their employees worldwide were women .
